channel.title: We can do anything
channel.description:
after seeing that rant yesterday i believe we teh people can control jagex through these rants.
I say we start another one to make holiday items tradable or unban accounts before the new banning system make them drop black mask or p hat
who is with me
world 27 fally p2p world 81 varock f2p

item.title: We can do anything
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

How could they possibly make holiday drops tradable? If they do, they would be worthless, because there is an infinite supply. If they cut off the supply, then it would be unfair. If you want money, just macro, you lazy bastard.

Read full topic

item.title: We can do anything
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

sicarius99:

jagex just makes the game they dont give a shit if you cheat or not its the mods doing all the works.

Mmmm, no. Jagex is the corporate entity that makes sure the game makes lots of money, and though arguably it’s better for the in-game economy to have lots of cheaters, they do try to prevent cheating as much as possible. Mods don’t really do shit to stop cheating, and most cheaters aren’t caught by human intervention anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: We can do anything
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Now jagex listening to us about the rule shit

Hahaha. No, Jagex stopped listening to players quite a few years ago. In case you weren’t playing then, you could read the news archives on tip.it, which details how the in the beginning of Runescape Andrew actually listened to players and changed the game according to what worked and what didn’t.

Now, Jagex just changes the game in whatever way will make them more money.

Read full topic

item.title: We can do anything
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Yes, because what you were appealing for was reasonable. Also, in case you haven’t noticed, he’s only letting the rule go until every has a chance to read it…

Secondly, asking for tradeable holiday drops is in no way reasonable. Your just hoping for some ‘get rich quick’ shit. It ain’t going to happen.

Read full topic
